entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 11 February 2023
